profile.name: Keith Wilkinson
profile.title: Water Operations Lead
profile.tagline: Operations, compliance, and practical systems thinking.

currently.role: Building a practical library of tools and references for treatment operations.
currently.focus: Operational reliability, alarm quality, and treatment optimization workflows.
currently.learning: Advanced treatment strategy, automation patterns, and regulatory translation.

highlights: Led daily operations and process control for conventional treatment train.
Built repeatable SOP/checklist flow for shift turnovers and startup conditions.
Reduced nuisance alarms through severity and wording standardization effort.
Managed compliance sample workflows and QA/QC review.
Supported DBP and microbial monitoring investigation and reporting.
Improved lab handoff documentation between bench and operations teams.
